description.en: Front-line stories of the Defense Force not covered in the main series!
Sporadically posted comic pages on the official twitter of the Bombergirl arcade game.

We may not know anything about that girl who's in the same class and has the same route to school yet— a sweet, sour, and embarrassing omnibus of three girls drawn by Toyobayashi Sakane, a "more than youth but less than romance" expert!!

title.en: Kemono Joushi ni Jitsuwa Mitomerarete Ita Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 獣上司に実は認められていた話

description.en:
In a world where beastmen stand on top of humans, OL Saki continues to struggle to lose.

Saki endured the days of power harassment from her boss, but one day she was suddenly called by the company president, Atlas.

I'll do my best!

Mofumofu story with 100% power of healing ♪

A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)
description.es:
Japón tiene la mayor tasa de incidencias por ataques de Kaijus de todo el mundo. Los Kaijus irrumpen continuamente y sin piedad en las vidas cotidianas de la gente. Kafka Hibino, que siempre quiso ser un miembro de las Fuerzas de Defensa, actualmente trabaja como limpiador de cadáveres de Kaijus.
Sin embargo, un día, una misteriosa criatura convierte a Kafka en un Kaiju, y las Fuerzas de Defensa de Japón, encargados de derrotar a estos monstruos, le identificaron con el nombre clave de “Kaiju N.8”.
description.fr:
Enfant, Kafka Hibino rêvait d’intégrer les Forces de Défense pour combattre ces terribles ennemis, mais après de nombreux échecs à l’examen d’entrée, ce trentenaire travaille à nettoyer les rues de leurs encombrants cadavres. Jusqu’au jour où une mystérieuse créature s’introduit dans son organisme et le métamorphose en une entité surpuissante mi-humaine, mi-kaiju. Son nouveau nom de code : “Kaiju n° 8” !

Maison d'édition FR : Kazé / Crunchyroll
description.it:
Un uomo, infelice del lavoro che deve fare per il resto della sua vita, rimane coinvolto in un evento inaspettato…!  
Si è trasformato in un kaiju, una creatura mostruosa, che gli darà un'altra opportunità per raggiungere ciò che ha sempre sognato!
description.ja: 怪獣発生率が世界屈指の日本。この国は、容赦なく怪獣が日常を侵していた。かつて防衛隊員を目指していたが、今は怪獣専門清掃業で働く日比野カフカ。ある日カフカは、謎の生物によって、身体が怪獣化、怪獣討伐を担う日本防衛隊からコードネーム「怪獣8号」と呼ばれる存在になる。
description.ru: Некоторые люди проживают серую жизнь, так и не пережив ничего захватывающего. Но нашему герою вроде бы повезло: хоть он и был недоволен работой, которой ему пришлось заниматься, случается кое-что неожиданное. Он превращается в кайдзю — чудовищное существо, и теперь получает шанс не просто изменить свою жизнь, а достичь всего, о чём он когда-либо мечтал!
description.tr: Yapmak zorunda olduğu işinde pek de memnun olmayan bir adam beklenmedik olaylara karışır..! Bir Kaiju'ya, dehşet verici korkunç, muazzam bir yaratığa dönüşür. Peki ya bu, uzun zamandır hayal ettiği şeylere sonunda kavuşabileceği fırsatıysa..?.
description.pt-br: Um homem, descontente com o trabalho que teve na vida, está envolvido em um evento inesperado...! Ele se torna um Kaijuu, uma criatura monstruosa, dando-lhe uma nova chance de alcançar o que ele sempre sonhou!

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

description.en: The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. (Source: [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

altTitles.th: โทรจิตละอองดาว

description.en: Umika is a very shy girl who has always been very bad at communicating with others. Over time she gave up on making any friends, until one day she meets the transfer student Yuu. Yuu claims to be an alien with the power of "Foreheadelepathy" - being able to read people's emotions by pressing her forehead to theirs.    From the up-and-coming author Okuma Rasuko, a dazzling story about yuri, space and youth.
description.pt-br: Umika é uma estudante muito gentil e tímida. Ela acha difícil falar com outras pessoas e sonha em um dia conhecer alguém de outro planeta. Mas sua solitária vida escolar toma um rumo cósmico quando ela conhece a nova aluna transferida chamada Yu, uma alienígena com poderes telepáticos! As duas se aproximam e prometem um dia irem ao espaço. É assim que elas decidem construir um foguete e disparar em direção às estrelas, fazendo novas amizades pelo caminho.

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei

altTitles.ja: 転生王女と天才令嬢の魔法革命

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生王女與天才千金的魔法革命

altTitles.zh: 转生王女与天才千金的魔法革命

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhuǎnshēng wángnǚ yǔ tiāncái qiānjīn de mófǎ gémìng

altTitles.ko: 전생 왕녀와 천재 영애의 마법 혁명

altTitles.ru: Магическая революция перерождённой принцессы и гениальной юной леди

altTitles.id: Revolusi Ajaib Putri yang Bereinkarnasi dan Wanita Muda yang Jenius

altTitles.it: La magica rivoluzione della principessa reincarnata e della figlia geniale

altTitles.vi: Cuộc cách mạng ma thuật của công chúa chuyển sinh và tiểu thư thiên tài

altTitles.th: การปฏิวัติเวทมนตร์ขององค์หญิงเกิดใหม่กับยัยคุณหนูยอดอัจฉริยะ

description.en:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. That's when Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name-which somehow involves them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom...and the entire world!

---
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)
description.es-la: Anis Sophia, a princesa que lembrou de sua vida passada quando criança, assim como o seu amor intenso pela magia do seu eu antigo, saiu para vivenciar fantasias nesse mundo de fantasia. Um dia, durante um acidente mágico, ela se deparou com uma cena em que seu irmão, Algard, estava rompendo o noivado com sua pretendente, Euphilia. O que ninguém poderia prever é que esse estranho encontro acabaria mudando o rumo da história.

title.en: I Have No Intention of Dating

description.en:
"I want to live a simple life."
"I'm not interested in dating in the office."

Dohee, who wants to live quietly as usual, and Dongyi, a co-worker who 'likes' to be alone. 

How intimate are these two people who keep seeing each other?

In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected. A series of "firsts" begins!
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.

description.en: A mystery murder case shatters Lan Zhiqing's serene and blissful life into pieces. The past she has long forgotten returns in the form of a nightmarish case, encroaching ever the closer... Shocked, Lan Zhiqing discovers that the most dangerous existence may just be the person she shares a bed with.

title.en: Raising the Princess After Her Death

altTitles.en: A Princess Is Raised After Death
The Princess Is Raised After She Dies

altTitles.ja: 正規エンディングまで異世界ループ転生

altTitles.en: Raising the Princess to Overcome Death

description.en: The long-term public service exam candidate, Minseo, finds himself trapped in the game, “Raising Lena” as he tries to escape his grim reality. In the game, Minseo becomes a character named Leo, and he must navigate through a world with three different scenarios to accomplish his mission of turning the protagonist, Lena, into a princess. However, the game “Raising Lena” boasts an overwhelming level of difficulty due to enemies who are set to thwart Minseo with their immense power and influence. Will Minseo be able to complete the game by making Lena a princess and return to reality?

When I was ten, I fell from a tree and hit my head. When I woke up, the world around me had changed. I could see people’s emotions in the form of numbers and colours—pink for love, red for anger, green for awkwardness, blue for sorrow, yellow for desire…
I met Yan Kongshan the summer after college entrance exams on Green Plum Island. Mysterious and handsome, with a tinge of melancholy, he was the ideal man of every woman on the island. And mine.
I wanted him to turn pink for me, but one day, he suddenly turned yellow. Despite that, he seemed ever so nonchalant when facing me.
Love is like lemon soda water. Sour and sweet, filled with energy.
You never know how a person’s heart beats for you, hidden in its cage beneath their flesh.

title.en: Himitsu no AiPri Full Color Osarai 4-Koma

altTitles.en: The Secret of AiPri - Full Color Review 4-Koma

altTitles.ja: ひみつのアイプリ フルカラーおさらい4コマ

description.en: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)

title.en: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.ja: お互いどんどんハマっていく教育係と新入社員

altTitles.en: The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other

altTitles.ja: くらいあの子としたいこと

altTitles.en: What I’d like to do with that gloomy girl

altTitles.id: Apa yang inginku lakukan dengan gadis yang murung itu?

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurai Ano Ko to Shitai Koto

altTitles.zh: 想与阴暗的她一起做的事

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng yǔ yīn'àn de tā yīqǐ zuò de shì

description.en: That gloomy girl is so beautiful! Let's aim for it! A school romance comedy together with that reserved, cute girl as we try to stop being loners!
description.ja:
陰のある子は美しい！
内気可愛いあの子と送る、目指せ脱ぼっち学園ラブコメ！
description.pt-br: A garota sombria é linda!  Uma romcom escolar sobre uma garota fofa e tímida e um garoto que quer fazer amigos!

title.en: A Story of Being Toyed with by the Plain Girl in Class

altTitles.ja: クラスの地味女子に翻弄されるはなし

altTitles.ja-ro: Class no Jimi Joshi ni Honrou Sareru Hanashi
Frontier Diary  ~Motokizoku no Isekai Henkyo Seikatsu Nikki~

altTitles.ja: フロンティアダイアリー　～元貴族の異世界辺境生活日記

description.en:
Saphate is the second son of the Greed noble family. He hates the way his clan squeezes the money from the population and the way it wastes it and when he went to oppose his family's way of act, he's kicked out. Although he lost his job at the Magic Academy and become a wanderer, he managed to live normally with his former elf colleague and a cat maid that worked for his family and that left her work for following him…  
  
This is a story that narrates his everyday life
description.es-la:
Safate es el segundo hijo de la noble familia Greed. Odia la forma en que su clan exprime el dinero de la población y la forma en que lo desperdicia, y cuando fue a oponerse a la forma de actuar de su familia, lo echaron. Aunque perdió su trabajo en la Academia Mágica y se convirtió en un vagabundo, logró vivir normalmente con su antigua colega elfa y una criada que trabajaba para su familia y que dejó su trabajo por seguirlo… 

Esta es una historia que narra su vida cotidiana.

description.en: In the year 2008, high school girl Sakura Minamoto is abruptly killed in a traffic accident. Ten years later, Sakura, along with six "legendary" girls from various eras of Japan's history, are brought back as zombies by a man named Kotaro Tatsumi, who seeks to save the Saga prefecture by putting together an all-zombie idol group.

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

**Links:**  
**Officially Translated:**   
- Alternative English version by [K MANGA](<https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10076/episode/319887>)
- Alternative English version by [Inkr Comics](<https://inkr.page.link/Hmgv5BX51rftn9ar5>)
- In French by [Pika](<https://www.pika.fr/serie/your-eternity>)   
- In Italian by [Star Comics](<https://www.starcomics.com/fumetto.aspx?Fumetto=281315>)   
- In Polish by [Kotori](<http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/ku-twej-wiecznosci/>)   
- In Russian by [Istari](<https://istaricomics.com/katalog-knig/manga/istari-comics/to-your-eternity/>)   
- In German by [Egmont](<https://www.egmont-shop.de/to-your-eternity-01.html>)   
- In Indonesian by [m&c!](<http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/untukmu-yang-abadi-01>) as **Untukmu yang Abadi** (2019)
- In Brazilian Portuguese by [NewPOP](<https://www.lojanewpop.com.br/uma-vida-imortal-to-your-eternity-15576289>)
description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en:
In Himi city, where handball is the most popular sport and famous schools come to scout the players, there's Hinezumi High School, the only public school. After going to the inter high 4 years ago, they want to come back there and recover their glory. And for that they have established a height rule, preventing small players to enter the club since height equals power and they don't want small players who can do nothing against bigger opponents.  
  
Now Shiguma Eito, small first year who came from Tokyo, is fixated on joining the club since handball is the thing he wants to do…

altTitles.en: The Meals Of A Single Woman (26) At Her Limit
The Suffering of a 26 Year Old Unloved Female Doomer

altTitles.vi: Bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị (26) độc thân

altTitles.es-la: Comidas de despedida de soltera de 26 años
El sufrimiento de una Doomer no amada de 26 años

description.en: Daily life of a 26 year old NEET with a bombastic bod
description.ja:
鬱、孤独、たまに飯。
仕事につかれ、生活につかれた限界独身女子の柊さん。どんなに憂鬱でも、おなかだけは空いてしまうようです。
description.vi: Cuộc sống hằng ngày cùng những bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị độc thân thất nghiệp chán đời.
description.es-la: La Sr. Hiiragi, es una chica marginalmente soltera que está cansada del trabajo y la vida. No importa cuán deprimido esté, mi estómago parece estar vacío.

title.en: Jyoshikou no Ouji-sama ga Watashi shika Ganchyuu ni nai rashii Yuri Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: 女子校の王子様は私しか眼中にないらしい 百合アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.ko: 여학교의 왕자님이 나 말고는 안중에 없는 것 같다 백합 앤솔로지 코믹

altTitles.en: The Prince of the Girls’ School Seems to Only Have Eyes for Me Yuri Anthology Comic

description.en:
"At the school I attend, there's a so-called 'prince of the girls' school.' Beautiful and accomplished — she's beloved by all. But for some reason, this prince seems to only have eyes for me...!?"

A yuri anthology comic of short love stories about various princes, including sparkling princes, athletic princes, and hidden otaku princes.

title.en: Isso Anata ga Todome wo Sashite

altTitles.ja: いっそあなたがトドメを刺して

altTitles.ja-ro: Isso Anata ga Todome o Sashite

altTitles.en: Better You Give Me The Final Blow

description.en:
Ichika is a female college student who wants to have a normal relationship, but is often judged by her appearance. One night at a drinking party she attended, hoping to have a wonderful encounter, she met Kousei who was kind to her. She is attracted to him because they got the same interest, enjoys talking with him and he likes her just the way she is — but she didn't know he had a secret no one knows about. 

(Source: heartbuzz2d)
description.pt-br: Ichika é uma estudante universitária do sexo feminino que deseja ter um relacionamento normal, mas muitas vezes é julgada pela sua aparência. Uma noite, numa festa em que ela participou, esperando ter um encontro maravilhoso, ela conheceu Kousei, que foi gentil com ela. Ela se sente atraída por ele porque eles têm os mesmos interesses, gosta de conversar com ele e ele gosta dela do jeito que ela é — mas ela não sabia que ele tinha um segredo que ninguém conhece.

altTitles.th: สาวโฉดไร้ปรานี

description.en: Wergelder: in Germanic law, the money paid by a murderer or his family to the victim’s family in atonement. A mysterious deal goes down on a remote island known as a red-light pleasure district. An insane fight between a blonde sniper and an assassin in a Chinese dress brings up questions about who the players are in this deal. A group of misfit yakuza gets caught in the crossfire while trying to get in on the deal, or at least find out what’s being dealt. At the center of it all is a woman who has been wronged in the worst imaginable ways. She will have her revenge. Eisner award-winning creator of Blade of the Immortal Hiroaki Samura presents a new badass thriller with some very bad ladies!
description.es: La historia de acción gira en torno a las batallas por dinero entre tres mujeres: una "vengadora psicodélica apasionada" llamada Nami, una "máquina de matar vestida de china" llamada Je-Mao, y una líder de pandilla femenina llamada Shinobu Aza.
description.pt-br: Wergelder: o direito Germânico, o dinheiro pago pelo assassino ou sua família para a família da vítima em expiação. Uma misteriosa negociação acontece em uma ilha remota conhecida como um distrito de prazer de luz vermelha. Uma luta insana entre uma franco-atiradora loira e uma assassina com um vestido chinês levanta questões sobre quem são os jogadores desta negociação. Um grupo de yakuza desajustado é apanhado no fogo cruzado enquanto tenta entrar na negociação, ou pelo menos descobrir o que está sendo negociado. No centro de tudo isso, está uma mulher que foi enganada das piores maneiras imagináveis. Ela terá sua vingança.

altTitles.ja-ro: Jinrui Saigo no α to Ω
Jinrui Saigo no Alpha to Omega

altTitles.ja: ラスト・オメガバース

description.en: It's been 100 years since the extinction of alphas and omegas. These genders now only exist in textbooks. Ayase, who was born with an "Omega mutation" in this world where only betas exist, has to labor as an AV male actor in order to secretly obtain expensive suppressants. "I would never be able to have a normal love life" is what Ayase thought, but one day, a fateful encounter with a man named Inukai left him with an uncontrollable desire. However, when they tried connecting their bodies for the first time that night, 'that' happened?!

Emilie has lived a sheltered life. Longing for a life like the protagonist in her beloved novel who shares the same name, Emilie leaves home on her own and travels to the villa inherited from her great-great-grandfather on Hazama Hill. There, she finds a sleeping backpacker named Shura and many mysterious creatures!

A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

description.en: On a desolate Earth that has become difficult for human habitation, Itsuki, unconscious for two years because of an accident, ekes out a living on an island yet flourishing with his caretaker from childhood, Jun. While Itsuki doesn't remember what kind of accident he was in, he's fine with how things are as long as he's with his love, Jun... that is, until they have to start worrying about their dwindling resources. One day, the two of them find a mysterious machine and hear a voice from its communications device. Perhaps... there are other people still living on Earth as well. Though Itsuki is excited that the two of them can continue living together forever if they receive help, Jun's response is not so hopeful...

title.en: Fuku wo Kiru nara Konna Fuu ni

altTitles.ja: 服を着るならこんなふうに

altTitles.en: Do It this Way If you Wear the Clothes.
If You're Gonna Dress Up, Do It Like This

altTitles.vi: Đã ăn diện thì phải ăn diện sao cho đúng.

description.en: Yuusuke, an average office worker meets with his friend at a reunion, only to find out that the fashion world has left him behind. Now, with the help of his sister Tamaki, Yuusuke must take his step into the world of trends and charisma.
description.pt-br: Yuusuke, um trabalhador de escritório comum encontra-se com seu amigo em uma reunião, apenas para descobrir que o mundo da moda o deixou para trás. Agora, com a ajuda de sua irmã Tamaki, Yuusuke deve entrar no mundo das tendências e do carisma

altTitles.ja: レナタ タッテ 貸与れる女神

description.en: Renata, a once almighty goddess, has returned in the modern day and must do odd jobs to earn offerings in order to restore her powers and save the world from an incoming monster uprising.

Hands. It is one of the most complex organs in the human body, with a particularly complex function and structure. Therefore, there is a doctor who specializes in this organ: <Hand Surgeon>. Isshin Tezuka is a hand surgeon at Ohrando Hospital. He has an aloof appearance and is full of mystery, but the only thing that is certain about him is that he is an extremely talented hand surgeon. This is a life story woven by his hands and the many hands he heals. An authentic medical drama for the new era!
description.ja:
その日、病院に運び込まれた男性は、事故で右腕が切断されていた。絶望する男性の息子に救急スタッフが告げる。「再接着手術を行います――」「くっつくんですか…父の右腕が!?」不可能を可能にするのは【手専門の医者】。

【手外科医】手塚一心。

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

title.en: Mikami to Sato wa Mada Yamashikunai

altTitles.en: Mikami And Sato Are Still Innocent

altTitles.ja: 三上と里はまだやましくない

description.en: Mikami, who has zero romantic experience, thoughtlessly kisses his roommate and best friend Sato. What will happen next between the two friends?

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

altTitles.fr: Le dragon domestique de Mme. Kobayashi

altTitles.es: La sirvienta dragón de la señorita Kobayashi

altTitles.th: น้องเมดมังกรของคุณโคบายาชิ

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Dragão da Senhorita Kobayashi

altTitles.pt: A Empregada Dragão da Senhora Kobayashi

description.en:
Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.  
A mythical everyday life comedy about a hard working office lady living with a dragon girl.  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E6%9E%97%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%A1%E3%81%AE%E3%83%A1%E3%82%A4%E3%83%89%E3%83%A9%E3%82%B4%E3%83%B3)
description.ru:
Жила себе и жила Кобаяши-сан. Одна в своей квартире, пока на пороге её дома не появилась Тору, у которой долг перед Кобаяши-сан за своё спасение. И Тору всячески желает вернуть его различными способами каждый день. Милая и повседневная комедия. Только есть одна необычная деталь: Тору – влюбленная драконесса.  
  
Licensed in English by Seven Seas as "Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid."  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18807)
description.pt-br: Kobayashi vive sozinha em um apartamento, até que um dia, Tooru, a garota dragão, apareceu e elas acabaram morando juntas. Tooru vê os humanos como seres inferiores e tolos. Mas tendo sido salva por Kobayashi-san, ela faz tudo que pode para pagar a dívida e ajudá-la com várias coisas, embora nem tudo corre conforme o planejado. Uma comédia do cotidiano mítico sobre uma mulher do escritório trabalhando duro para viver com uma garota dragão.

title.en: Game Shoshinsha no Mari-nee ga Iku VRMMO Nonbiri? Taikenki: Mebius World Online

altTitles.ja: ゲーム初心者の真里姉が行くVRMMOのんびり？体験記～Mebius World Online～

altTitles.ja-ro: Geemu shoshinsha no Mari-nee ga iku VRMMO nonbiri? taikenki

altTitles.en: First time gamer Mari-nee's leisurely? VRMMO Journal

description.en: At the recommendation of her younger brother who lives with her, Mari Akizuki decides to play the massively popular VRMMORPG "Mebius World Online". Being a beginner, she had only wanted to enjoy the game at a leisurely pace... But before she knows it, she ends up battling a boss monster, earning a rare skill, and becoming the center of attention?! And so begins the kind-hearted Mari-nee's VRMMO life, as she bonds with both players and NPCs alike!

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!

altTitles.en: You Can't Lie to the Saintess
You Can't Lie to a Saint

description.en: Chloe, who works as an apprentice priestess in a remote church, is a money-loving girl who makes a lot of money at night by gambling at cards, using her insight and memory as weapons. When Erald, a rich holy knight, visits her, he asks her to infiltrate the church as a candidate for sainthood and find the murderer who committed a murder two years ago...?
description.ja: 辺境の教会で神官見習いとして働くクロエは、持ち前の洞察力と記憶力を武器に、夜な夜なカード賭博で荒稼ぎするお金大好き少女。そんな彼女のもとを訪れた成金聖騎士エラルドは、「聖女候補として大教会に潜入し、二年前の殺人事件の犯人を見つけてほしい」とクロエに依頼をして‥‥！？

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

altTitles.ja: 邪神ちゃんドロップキック

description.en:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
description.ja:
魔界の悪魔、通称「邪神ちゃん」は、ある日突然、人間界に召喚されてしまう。
彼女を召喚したのは、神保町のボロアパートで暮らす、ちょっとブラックな心を持つ女子大生、花園ゆりねだった。しかもゆりねは、邪神ちゃんを魔界に帰す方法がわからないと言う。仕方なく一緒に暮らし始めた邪神ちゃんとゆりね。しかし、召喚者が死ねば魔界に帰れることから邪神ちゃんはゆりねを……!?
少女と邪神ちゃんが繰り広げるちょっとキケンな同居生活コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Jashin-chan Dropkick é uma comédia violenta sobre uma lolita gótica, Yurine, que invoca uma garota demônio com um rabo de cobra, Jashin-chan.
Elas terão que viver juntas até que Yurine encontre uma maneira de enviar Jashin-chan de volta ao inferno, ou até que Jashin-chan mate Yurine.

description.en: A remake of the original Mazinger Z manga in celebration of its 50th anniversary. Most of this story was first published in Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter. So this manga can be thought of as the in-universe version of the story that Gekiman creates in the autobiography manga [Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter](https://mangadex.org/title/a6d69815-f5f9-4ab8-9d53-5b4d1ee6601e/gekiman-mazinger-z-chapter)

The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

title.en: Nito no Taidana Isekai Shoukougun ~Saijaku Shoku "Healer" nano ni Saikyou wa Cheat desu ka?~

altTitles.ja: ニトの怠惰な異世界症候群 ～最弱職＜ヒーラー＞なのに最強はチートですか？～

altTitles.ja-ro: NEET no Taidana Isekai Shoukougun: Saijaku Shoku "Healer" nano ni Saikyou wa Cheat desu ka?

altTitles.en: A NEET’s Guide to the Parallel World: Healer, the Strongest Cheat?
Nito’s Guide to the Parallel World: Healer, the Strongest Cheat?

altTitles.ru: Синдром ленивого Нито, в ином мире

altTitles.zh: 尼特的慵懒异世界症候群

altTitles.zh-hk: 尼特的慵懶異世界症候群

altTitles.ko: 니트의 나태한 이세계 증후군 ~최약직 <힐러>인데 최강은 치트입니까?~

description.en: Hidako Masamune is a high school student who suffers from continuous bullying by his classmates. Becoming tired of it all, he decides to commit suicide, but instead he is transported to another world along with all his classmates. When they arrive, they find that they now possess amazing abilities but he was only granted the status of a "healer," the weakest skill of all. The king decides to get rid of him by transporting him to another faraway place, but not before Hidako swears revenge against the king, the kingdom, and all of his classmates.
description.fr: Hidako Masamune est un lycéen qui est continuellement harcelé, brimé par ses camarades de classe. Lassé de tout cela, il décide de se suicider, mais il est transporté dans un autre monde avec tous ses camarades de classe. À leur arrivée, ils découvrent qu'ils possèdent désormais des capacités étonnantes, lui en revanche, n'a obtenu que le statut de "guérisseur", la plus faible de toutes les compétences. Le roi décide de se débarrasser de lui en le transportant dans un autre lieu éloigné, mais pas avant que Hidako ne jure de se venger contre le roi, le royaume et tous ses camarades de classe.
description.pt-br: Hidako Masamune é um estudante do ensino médio que sofre bullying constante por seus colegas de classe. Ficando cansado de tudo, ele decide se matar, mas ao invés disso ele é transportado para outro mundo junto com seus colegas de classe. Quando ele chega, ele os encontra em posse de excelentes habilidades, mas ele foi o único que ganhou a classe de “healer”, a classe mais fraca de todas. O rei decide transportá-lo para outro lugar bem longe, mas não antes de Hidako jurar vingança contra o rei, o reino, e todos os seus colegas de classe.

title.en: Kenja no Deshi wo Nanoru Kenja

altTitles.ja: 賢者の弟子を名乗る賢者 THE COMIC

altTitles.en: She Professed Herself Pupil of the Wise Man

altTitles.fr: Enchantée, je suis la disciple du Sage !

altTitles.id: Dia Mengakui Dirinya Murid Orang Bijak!

description.en:
In one of the worlds that exist within virtual reality, Kagami held the title of one of the Nine Sages, a position that placed him at the pinnacle of magicians. One day, he fell asleep in-game after pulling an all-nighter. When he opened his eyes, what he found was a world that was different to the one before… More important than anything else, was that the grizzled and dignified veteran’s body that he was used to, had now turned into an innocent little girl’s. If his true identity was leaked, honestly speaking it was a situation where it was very possible that the solemn image he had built up until now would be destroyed. And to deal with this problem, the excuse that he came up with was…


---

**Note:** MangaDex decided to follow the magazine numbering for ch. 1-56 and include ch. 53-56 in volume 9:
- volume 2-5 add an offset of 4 chapters to the magazine by excluding/merging some chapters.
- Volume 10 corrected the 4 chapter offset and returned to the magazine numbering by skipping chapter 53-56.
- The chapters were assigned to the volumes with the corrected numbering (see chapter mapping)
- Ch. 53-56 is included in vol. 9

+++ Extraneous information

Volume | Offset
:- | :-
2 | 1
3 | 2
5 | 1

+++

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/she-professed-herself-pupil-of-the-wise-man-light-novel/)
description.fr:
Dans un des mondes de la réalité virtuelle, Kagami possède le titre d’un des Neuf Sages, le plaçant au sommet de tous les magiciens. Un jour, il s’endort pendant une session de nuit en pleine partie. Lorsqu’il ouvre les yeux, il découvre un monde différent de celui qu’il connait… Et bien plus important, son avatar, un vieux sage vétéran et à l’air digne, a été remplacé par une petite fille. Si sa véritable identité venait à être révélée, l’image qu’il a mis tant de temps à se créer auprès des gens serait détruite. Pour remédier à cela, l’excuse qu’il a trouvé est…


---
description.ja: とあるオンラインゲームの九賢者の一人、召喚士ダンブルフこと咲森鑑はある日ゲームが現実となった世界へ飛ばされてしまう。しかも老練な賢者の姿ではなく可憐な少女の姿で。築き上げた賢者の威厳を守るためにも賢者の弟子「ミラ」と名乗ることになる。

description.en:
In the middle Heian period, a small island called Onishima is isolated from civilization.
As a young girl, Torago was playing with her sister, Tana, when she disappears into the sea unexpectedly.
However, it wasn't Torago's fault, but the fault of another boy who was playing with them.
Torago and that boy grew up with guilt, and later ended up together, but one day a woman who looks like “Tana” appears in Onishima...
description.es:
A mediados del periodo Heian, la pequeña isla de Onishima está aislada de la civilización.
De niña, Torago estaba jugando junto al mar con su hermana, Tana, cuando esta desapareció por causas ajenas a su voluntad.
Sin embargo, no fue culpa de Torago, sino de otro niño que jugaba con ellas.
Torago y el chico crecen juntos, ambos llenos de culpa, y más tarde terminan juntos, pero un día una mujer que se parece a «Tana» aparece en Onishima...
description.ja:
平安時代中頃、文明から隔離された小さな島「鬼島」。
トラゴは幼少時代、実姉「タナ姉え」と海辺で遊んでいるとき、自分のせいで「タナ姉え」を行方不明にしてしまう。
だが、それはトラゴの過失ではなく、一緒に遊んでいたもう一人の少年の過失だった。
トラゴと少年は共に罪悪感にさいなまれながら成長し、後に結婚するが、ある日「タナ姉え」に似た女が鬼島に漂流してきた…。
